What do I get exactly?

Live LADBS results filtered by value/keywords. One-click CSV. Optional email alerts. No logins, zero friction.

Can I cancel anytime?

Get Free CSV

About PermitPulse

PermitPulse watches LADBS permit filings so contractors can act first. Daily CSVs, instant alerts, zero friction. We're not building a platform—we're solving one specific problem: getting you clean, current permit data before your competitors see it. Small team, tight focus, designed for people who win work by being early.

Frequently asked

What’s in the CSV?

Permit number, address, status, issue date, subtype, valuation, lat/lon, plus raw fields.

How fresh is it?

We pull directly from LADBS throughout the day. Free tier shows last 3 days; paid includes 90.

Cancel anytime?

Yes. 14-day “no value, no pay” refund on Pro.
